message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique item. I would like to propose a price of $14000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $13000. However, I'm willing to compromise further. I'll sell the product to you for $13250. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $13100. This is my final offer. What do you think?
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.
